post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, November 27
post.Content:
A relatively quiet week in desktop Java land, but definitely no less interesting! :-)

  • William Ant√¥nio Siqueira has written about visualising a neural network activation using JavaFX. This is very cool!
  • Tom Schindl has written about e4 on JavaFX.
  • Edvin Syse, Thomas Nield, and others have extended their TornadoFX project to create a kotlin-friendly wrapper around the ControlsFX project.
  • Almas Baimagambetov continues to improve his JavaFX Game Library (FXGL) project with new features and bug fixes.
  • Gerrit Grunwald has another Friday Fun Component: circular plots!
